about_the_game:
In the demo version you can check out a level from each world to inspire you to create your own levels.

FULL VERSION
* Adventure mode with 50 levels
* Create 50 levels in the Editor
* 400 bonus levels

COMPATIBILITY
* Display: 16:9 (only)
* Resolutions: 720p, 1080p, 1440p and 4K
* Controller: You can try to use generic models. But the game was designed using official Xbox controllers.

Enjoy!
detailed_description:
In the demo version you can check out a level from each world to inspire you to create your own levels.

FULL VERSION
* Adventure mode with 50 levels
* Create 50 levels in the Editor
* 400 bonus levels

COMPATIBILITY
* Display: 16:9 (only)
* Resolutions: 720p, 1080p, 1440p and 4K
* Controller: You can try to use generic models. But the game was designed using official Xbox controllers.

Enjoy!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Proton / Manjaro / Ubunto
  • Processor: 2.5ghz Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 950
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Proton / Manjaro / Ubunto
  • Processor: 3.0Ghz Octa Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060

name: Master Maker 3D Ultimate Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5ghz Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 950
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0Ghz Octa Core
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1300 MB available space

supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
